data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Busan.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Busan, South Korea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Busan, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Busan hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 576,844 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Khmer people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Khmer people know you.
Father, remind your church in Busan that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Busan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Busan, South Korea to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

location.name: Busan
location.people_groups_list: Korean, Kyrgyz, Malay, Uzbek, Northern, Turk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Korean (49,173,000), Kyrgyz (5,100), Malay (9,600), Uzbek, Northern (55,000), Turk (1,700)
